nodes.text: The Venture was a Courier-class yacht owned by the Pantoran businessman Arend Shen.

The Venture was approximately 40 meter long with a aerodynamic silver hull. It was highly modified by Shen for extravagant luxury and maximum speed. It was protected by forward-mounted firelinked light blasters and firelinked light blaster cannon turrets which provided a 180 degree firing arc.
